title: AWS Outage October 2025: How a DNS Glitch Disrupted the Global Internet
description: A breakdown of the October 2025 AWS outage caused by a DNS failure, how it propagated globally, and what it teaches us about cloud resilience and single points of failure.

title: IntelliJ IDEA vs VS Code: Unraveling the IDE Dilemma
description: A comparative analysis of IntelliJ IDEA and VS Code, covering performance, extensibility, developer workflows, and how to choose the right IDE based on your needs.

title: Mastering State Management in Flutter with MobX
description: An in-depth explanation of state management in Flutter using MobX, focusing on reactivity, observables, actions, and real-world architectural patterns.
